name: RawMaterialButton
desc: Creates a button based on [Semantics], [Material], and [InkWell] widgets.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: Called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: Called when the button is long-pressed.

fields.name: onHighlightChanged
fields.desc: Called by the underlying [InkWell] widget's [InkWell.onHighlightChanged] callback.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.RawMaterialButton.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the button.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: Defines the default text style, with [Material.textStyle], for the button's [child].

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: The color of the button's [Material].

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the button's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color for the button's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.desc: The highlight color for the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The splash color for the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] but not pressed.

fields.name: hoverElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] and a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: focusElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] and has the input focus.

fields.name: highlightElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] and pressed.

fields.name: disabledElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is not [enabled].

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The internal padding for the button's [child].

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the button's layout will be.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Defines the button's size.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the button's [Material].

fields.name: animationDuration
fields.desc: Defines the duration of animated changes for [shape] and [elevation].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: Typically the button's label.

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: Configures the minimum size of the tap target.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.
